animeTitle: Genkaku Cool na Sensei ga Aheboteochi!
animeDescription: Hazuki Mizushiro is a very popular teacher in school. One day, student Aoi gets enough courage to write a love letter to her. Much to his enjoyment, she responds to this letter.
animeStaff: [['Ishige, Rui', 'Director, Script, Character Design'], ['Kagami', 'Original Character Design'], ['Honjo, Yagi', 'Original Creator']]
